{{film infobox | image= | name=Page to Screen | episode=The Lord of the Rings | director= | producer=Ted Poole | writer= | narrator=David Hibbard | music= | cinematography= | editing= | distributor= | released=[[2002]] | runtime=46 minutes | country= | language=English | budget= | website= | imdb_id=0668876 }}'''''Page to Screen: The Lord of the Rings''''' is the 7th episode of ''Page to Screen'', a documentary television series that examines the process of bringing works of literature to the screen. ==Cast== [[Tom Shippey]]
